title: Sherlock's Lost Manuscript - A Detective's Dilemma
author: Alan Roman
content_markdown: # Sherlock's Lost Manuscript. ## A Detective's Dilemma. A frantic telegram arrived at 221B Baker Street. Manuscript stolen! Urgent assistance required!  Watson found Holmes pacing the room, his brow furrowed in concentration. The Professor's notes on deductive reasoning, Holmes declared, a priceless treasure! We must recover it before it falls into the wrong hands.
